title: A Cooler Climate
text:
A Cooler Climate is a 1999 American <a href="television%20film">made-for-television</a> <a href="drama%20%28film%20and%20television%29">drama film</a> directed by <a href="Susan%20Seidelman">Susan Seidelman</a> starring <a href="Sally%20Field">Sally Field</a> and <a href="Judy%20Davis">Judy Davis</a>. It is based on a book with the same name by Zena Collier and originally aired on <a href="Showtime%20%28TV%20network%29">Showtime</a> on August 22, 1999.
Award nominations.
<a href="Sally%20Field">Sally Field</a> and <a href="Judy%20Davis">Judy Davis</a> were both nominated for their performance in the film during the 6th Annual <a href="Screen%20Actors%20Guild%20Awards">Screen Actors Guild Awards</a> for outstanding performance by a female actor in a television movie or miniseries. They both also received an <a href="Emmy">Emmy</a> nomination for their performances in the film.
